I've ordered books from Amazon.co.jp before, it was only about 12$ US 
for shipping, and I got it in less than two weeks.  Good service.  
Most Japanese bookstores in the USA also carry them (Kinokuniya, 
etc.) Thats where I've picked up most of mine.
